languages.text: "Ваше появление на Даргонусе — благоволение Бога-Императора, даровавшего нам спасение. От лица всего Даргонуса и от семейства Версериан — благодарю вас за избавление от врагов наших".
"Your appearance on Dargonus is a boon from the God-Emperor, who has brought us salvation. On behalf of all of Dargonus and House Werserian, I thank you for delivering us from our foes."
languages.original_text: "Ваше появление на Даргонусе — благоволение Бога-Императора, даровавшего нам спасение. От лица всего Даргонуса и от семейства Версериан — благодарю вас за избавление от врагов наших".

traits.locale_text: "Your appearance on Dargonus is a boon from the God-Emperor who has brought us salvation. On behalf of all of Dargonus and House Werserian, I thank you for delivering us from our foes."
"Your appearance on Dargonus is a boon from the God-Emperor who has brought us salvation. On behalf of all of Dargonus and House Werserian, I thank you for delivering us from our foes."
"Your appearance on Dargonus is a boon from the God-Emperor, who has brought us salvation. On behalf of all of Dargonus and House Werserian, I thank you for delivering us from our foes."
"Your appearance on Dargonus is a boon from the God-Emperor, who has brought us salvation. On behalf of all of Dargonus and House Werserian, I thank you for delivering us from our foes."
"Your appearance on Dargonus is a boon from the God-Emperor, who has brought us salvation. On behalf of all of Dargonus and House Werserian, I thank you for delivering us from our foes."

languages.text: 「御身がダルゴナスに戻られたのは神帝陛下の恩恵です。我々に救いをもたらしてくださいました。ダルゴナスの全市民とウェルザリアン家を代表して、我々を敵から救ってくださったことに感謝します」
languages.original_text: "Your appearance on Dargonus is a boon from the God-Emperor, who has brought us salvation. On behalf of all of Dargonus and House Werserian, I thank you for delivering us from our foes."

traits.locale_text: 「御身がダルゴナスに戻られたのは神帝陛下の恩恵です。我々に救いをもたらしてくださいました。ダルゴナスの全市民とウェルザリアン家を代表して、我々を敵から救ってくださったことに感謝します」

languages.text: “您及时支援达戈努斯，这无疑是仁慈的神皇带来恩典。我代表达戈努斯的全体人民与韦尔森家族，感谢您将我们从敌人手中解救出来。”
languages.original_text: "Your appearance on Dargonus is a boon from the God-Emperor, who has brought us salvation. On behalf of all of Dargonus and House Werserian, I thank you for delivering us from our foes."

traits.locale_text: “您及时支援达戈努斯，这无疑是仁慈的神皇带来恩典。我代表达戈努斯的全体人民与韦尔森家族，感谢您将我们从敌人手中解救出来。”

languages.text: «Su llegada a Dargonus es un don del Dios Emperador, que nos ha traído la salvación. En nombre de todo Dargonus y de la casa Werserian, le agradezco que nos haya liberado de nuestros enemigos».
languages.original_text: "Your appearance on Dargonus is a boon from the God-Emperor, who has brought us salvation. On behalf of all of Dargonus and House Werserian, I thank you for delivering us from our foes."

traits.locale_text: «Su llegada a Dargonus es un don del Dios Emperador, que nos ha traído la salvación. En nombre de todo Dargonus y de la casa Werserian, le agradezco que nos haya liberado de nuestros enemigos».

languages.text: « Votre arrivée sur Dargonus est une bénédiction de l'Empereur-Dieu, qui nous a ainsi offert le salut. Au nom de toute la planète et de la maison Werserian, je vous remercie de nous avoir délivrés de nos ennemis. »
languages.original_text: "Your appearance on Dargonus is a boon from the God-Emperor, who has brought us salvation. On behalf of all of Dargonus and House Werserian, I thank you for delivering us from our foes."

traits.locale_text: « Votre arrivée sur Dargonus est une bénédiction de l'Empereur-Dieu, qui nous a ainsi offert le salut. Au nom de toute la planète et de la maison Werserian, je vous remercie de nous avoir délivrés de nos ennemis. »

languages.text: "Euer Erscheinen auf Dargonus ist ein Segen des Gottimperators, der uns Erlösung gebracht hat. Im Namen von ganz Dargonus und dem Haus Werserian danke ich Euch, dass Ihr uns vor unseren Feinden gerettet habt."
languages.original_text: "Your appearance on Dargonus is a boon from the God-Emperor, who has brought us salvation. On behalf of all of Dargonus and House Werserian, I thank you for delivering us from our foes."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Erscheinen auf Dargonus ist ein Segen des Gottimperators, der uns Erlösung gebracht hat. Im Namen von ganz Dargonus und dem Haus Werserian danke ich Euch, dass Ihr uns vor unseren Feinden gerettet habt."

languages.text: "Dargonus'a gelişiniz Tanrı İmparator'un lütfudur. Bu lütuf sayesinde kurtuluşa erdik. Tüm Dargonus ve Werserian Hanesi adına size teşekkürlerimi sunuyorum, bizi düşmandan kurtardınız."
languages.original_text: "Your appearance on Dargonus is a boon from the God-Emperor, who has brought us salvation. On behalf of all of Dargonus and House Werserian, I thank you for delivering us from our foes."

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus’a gelişiniz Tanrı İmparator’dan bir lütuftu. Bu lütuf sayesinde kurtuluşa erdik. Tüm Dargonus ve Werserian Hanesi adına size teşekkürlerimi sunuyorum, bizi düşmandan kurtardınız."
